Auxiliary Stuff
Consolidation of many items that I haven't looked into too much (residual changes from a vanilla DOL to 20XX's). Should be dissected and have its changes combined with their respective mods
[DRGN]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 ----- 0x2084 ------

00000000 00000000
00000000 00000000
000000

	-==-


Line Item Counter Branch
Branches to function located in MnSlChr at 0x3A53C0 (0x14 bytes long).
[Achilles]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 --- 0x803001DC ---- 7C0802A6 -> 48C91904


	-==-

SpawnItemEntity custom spawnitem_t
A portion of the first usable USB Screenshot Region, used for various flags.

Color Overlays Table
RRGGBB color format. Resides within MCC/USB Screenshots Regions, area 3. Might move/convert.
[Achilles]

90010004 9421FFD0 
93E1002C 3BE550E0

	-==-


Zeros II
Zeroed space in 20XX. Some of this space is reserved for future Debug Menu flag usage. Unclear if Achilles uses some of these spaces for flags or temporary storage during runtime, so it's being reserved and zeroed out for now. Could use some read/write breakpoint testing before removal or allocation for codespace.
[Achilles, DRGN]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 ---- 0x2254C0 ----- 7CA42A14 -> 00000000 # Flag reservation
NTSC 1.02 ---- 0x2254F8 -----

80650008 54630739
4D820020 900DB4F0
4E800020 7C0802A6
3C60803F 90010004
9421FFC8 93E10034
3BE3ADC8 93C10030
800DB4F0 28000000
41820090 4814DA49
4814DC51 2C03FFFF
4182001C 1C030060
3C60804C 38631D80
7C630214 83C30058
48000020 387F0000
4CC63182 4811CD25
387F0010 3880003D
38AD9460 4815F88D
80ADB4F4 3861000C
389F0020 4CC63182
38050001 900DB4F4
